mode.title: Mode
mode.description: Operation mode: file_explainer (explain a file), issue_solver (analyze issue + solution), or legacy types (issue, file)

url.title: GitHub URL
url.description: GitHub file URL (for file_explainer/file) or issue URL (for issue_solver/issue)

language.title: Output Language
language.description: Language for the explanation and solution.

useLingoTranslation.title: Use Lingo Translation
useLingoTranslation.description: If true, uses Lingo for high-quality translation. If false (default), AI responds directly in target language.

includeFlowchart.title: Include Flowchart
includeFlowchart.description: If true (default), generates a Mermaid.js flowchart explaining the code.
